meanings.definition: The act of converting a process or task to be performed by a computer.
meanings.sent1: The computerization of our inventory system has made tracking products much easier.
meanings.sent2: Many businesses are embracing computerization to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd see the day when computerization would make my job obsolete!
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, computerization is the key to efficiency and accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The impact of computerization on modern society cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: The process of implementing computer technology in various aspects of life.
meanings.sent1: Computerization has revolutionized how we communicate with each other.
meanings.sent2: The government is investing in computerization to improve public services.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world without computerization - chaos would reign!
meanings.sent4: Computerization is like a digital wave sweeping through every industry.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of computerization are evident in everyday conveniences.
